page.title: 05A boys Christmas holiday
page.content: On Christmas day my Nan and Granddad came to our house. We opened our presents in the afternoon. I had a Lego construction kit. On Boxing Day we went to my Nan's. My cousins went to my Nan's too. We played hide and seek. We had dinner. We were playing on the computer. We pulled some crackers. We had tea and played hide and seek again. We went home in the car after that and went to bed. The next morning I helped my Granddad clean out the pigs and my brush nearly went down the pit. I'm going to have my computer in my own room. I'm in my sister's room now. My Granddad owns a farm. We take the pigs to the market where they are killed and then sent to the butcher. Sometimes we eat our own pigs but they have to be slaughtered at Salisbury.
